submodules.title: User Interaction
submodules.description: An intuitive chat interface that allows users to describe their project ideas in natural language, making it accessible for everyone, regardless of technical expertise.

submodules.title: AI Response Generation
submodules.description: Utilizes advanced natural language processing to interpret user inputs and generate relevant responses, guiding users through the project creation process.

submodules.title: Feedback Mechanism
submodules.description: Allows users to provide feedback on AI suggestions, improving the chatbot's accuracy and relevance over time through machine learning.

submodules.title: Module Breakdown
submodules.description: AI analyzes the project idea and breaks it down into manageable modules, ensuring a clear structure that facilitates project execution.

submodules.title: Timeline Estimation
submodules.description: Automatically generates timelines for each module based on complexity and resource availability, helping users visualize project milestones.

submodules.title: Budget Allocation
submodules.description: Estimates costs associated with each module and allocates budget accordingly, providing users with a financial overview of their project.

submodules.title: Task Assignment
submodules.description: AI assigns tasks to contributors based on their skills, availability, and past performance, ensuring optimal resource utilization and productivity.

submodules.title: Skill Matrix
submodules.description: Maintains a comprehensive skill matrix of all contributors, allowing the AI to make informed decisions when assigning tasks and identifying gaps in expertise.

submodules.title: Availability Tracking
submodules.description: Monitors contributor availability in real-time, enabling dynamic task reallocation and ensuring that project timelines are met.

submodules.title: Progress Monitoring
submodules.description: Continuously tracks the progress of tasks and modules, providing users with real-time updates and insights into project status.

submodules.title: Nudge Notifications
submodules.description: Sends automated nudges to contributors to remind them of upcoming deadlines or pending tasks, helping to keep the project on track.

submodules.title: Reallocation of Work
submodules.description: If progress stalls, the AI can reallocate tasks to other contributors based on their availability and workload, ensuring that the project remains on schedule.

submodules.title: Dispute Handling
submodules.description: Facilitates resolution of disputes between contributors by providing a structured process for raising and addressing issues, ensuring a harmonious working environment.

submodules.title: Task Approval
submodules.description: Allows project managers to review and approve completed tasks before payments are released, ensuring quality control and accountability.

submodules.title: Automated Payments
submodules.description: Integrates with smart contracts to automate fund disbursement upon task completion, ensuring timely payments and reducing administrative overhead.

submodules.title: Contributor Onboarding
submodules.description: Streamlines the onboarding process using Self Protocol to verify identity, roles, and credentials, ensuring that all contributors are properly vetted.

submodules.title: Performance Tracking
submodules.description: Maintains a performance-based reputation system that evaluates contributors based on their work quality and timeliness, influencing future task assignments and incentives.

submodules.title: DAO Voting Mechanism
submodules.description: Enables contributors to participate in DAO voting for hiring or expelling team members, fostering a democratic and transparent team environment.
